New Records: Nikola Jokic and Russell Westbrook became the first teammates to record triple-doubles in the same game twice in a single season.
Nikola Jokic achieved his 15th triple-double of the season, and Russell Westbrook recorded his 202nd career triple-double, setting an NBA record.
Key Match Events: The Denver Nuggets defeated the Brooklyn Nets with a score of 124-105.
Nikola Jokic returned from illness and played a key role in the fourth quarter.
Russell Westbrook achieved a 25-point triple-double, his first in Denver.
Post-Match Reflections: Nikola Jokic emphasized the team's win over individual stats and highlighted the team's chemistry.
Russell Westbrook discussed leadership and energy as the team continues to gel.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets were leading by 18 before Brooklyn's comeback.
The game was played at the Moda Center in Denver.
Others: The article noted that other games on January 11 were postponed, but the Nuggets vs. Nets game was not affected.
